definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Even if cattle, horsed were sent from hell.
sentences.chinese: 阴间即使派来牛头马面。

sentences.english: And death and hell were cast into the lake of fire.
sentences.chinese: 死亡和阴间也被扔在火湖里。

sentences.english: Her house is a highway to the grave, leading down to the chambers of death.
sentences.chinese: 他的家是在阴间之路，下到死亡之宫。

sentences.english: What man can live and not see death, or save himself from the power of the grave ?
sentences.chinese: 谁能常活免死，救他的灵魂脱离阴间的权柄呢？

sentences.english: A return to help honor the grave, sacrifice power.
sentences.chinese: 一为帮荣，牺牲重返阴间的能量。

sentences.english: He rose, and ruled as god of the underworld.
sentences.chinese: 他活了过来并成为统治阴间的神。

sentences.english: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?
sentences.chinese: 因为在死地无人记念你，在阴间有谁称谢你。

sentences.english: The Celtics also offered the ghosts good things to eat.
sentences.chinese: 居尔特人也会准备美食给阴间的鬼怪。

sentences.english: Thou shalt beat him with the rod, and shalt deliver his soul from hell.
sentences.chinese: 你要用杖打他，就可以救他的灵魂免下阴间。

sentences.english: deeper than hell; what canst thou know?
sentences.chinese: 深于阴间，你还能知道什么。

sentences.english: Where is your destruction o sheol ?
sentences.chinese: 阴间哪，你的毁灭在那里？

sentences.english: What man is he that liveth, and shall not see death? shall he deliver his soul from the hand of the grave?
sentences.chinese: 谁能常活免死，救他的灵魂脱离阴间的权柄呢。

sentences.english: They know he can’t pay them from beyond the grave.
sentences.chinese: 他们清楚地知道阴间的君主是不可能犒劳他们的。

sentences.english: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.
sentences.chinese: 因为我心里满了患难，我的性命临近阴间。

sentences.english: For the wise the path of life leads upward, in order to avoid Sheol below.
sentences.chinese: 智慧人从生命的道上升，是他远离在下的阴间。

sentences.english: The Puranas talk about seven levels of the Netherworld .
sentences.chinese: 宇宙古史谈论了阴间世界的七个级别。

definition: Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
Two deities, one short, one tall, chained together at the ankle, responsible for rewarding the good and punishing the bad
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
old variant of 豐都|丰都[Feng1 du1]/Fengdu county Chongqing municipality/name of a famous necropolis
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
